name: kapowarr
tagline: A request and automation manager for comic book libraries
description: Kapowarr is a request manager and automation companion for comic book libraries. It integrates with downloaders and indexers to fetch issues, tracks series and requests, and provides a web UI for users to submit and monitor requests.

features.title: Automated Downloads
features.description: Automatically fetch new comic issues from configured sources. Keep your library up to date

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Connect to multiple comic indexers and search aggregators. Access vast comic catalogs

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Fetch and organize comic metadata, cover art, and series information. Maintain rich library details

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Define preferred formats, resolutions, and file sizes for downloads. Control library quality

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Web interface for users to request comics and track fulfillment. Manage library additions collaboratively

features.title: Download Client Support
features.description: Integrate with popular download clients for automated fetching. Seamless download workflow

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Automatic file renaming, folder structure, and organization. Keep comics neatly arranged
